Package ca.bankonit.models

Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.bankonit.models.Transaction
  • public final class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a transaction for a bank account.
    Version:
    Aug 3, 2021
    Author:
    Nick Hamnett

    • Constructor Detail

      • Transaction

        public Transaction​(long cardNumber,
                   char transactionType,
                   double amount,
                   java.util.Date date)
        Initializes a Transaction object.
        Parameters:
        cardNumber - Card number associated with the transaction.
        transactionType - Type of transaction (TYPE_WITHDRAW or TYPE_DEPOSIT)
        amount - Transaction amount. This will be changed to a positive/absolute number if it's negative.
        date - Date/time the transaction was performed.

    • Method Detail

      • getCardNumber

        public long getCardNumber()
        Gets the card number associated with the transaction.
        Returns:
        the cardNumber

      • getTransactionType

        public char getTransactionType()
        Gets the transaction type (TYPE_WITHDRAW or TYPE_DEPOSIT)
        Returns:
        the transaction type

      • getAmount

        public double getAmount()
        Gets the transaction amount. The amount is positive for both deposits and withdraws.
        Returns:
        the amount

      • getDate

        public java.util.Date getDate()
        Gets the date/time the transaction was performed.
        Returns:
        Date/time transaction was performed.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Formats the transaction as a string
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String with the format "Date: , Type: , Amount: $"
